title: Executive Order 12430-Reports of Identical Bids
content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and statutes of the United States of America, and in order to eliminate an agency reporting requirement which has proved ineffective and which consumes resources that could be employed in a more effective manner to prevent antitrust violations, Executive Order No. 10936, of April 24, 1961, is hereby revoked.
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 11:47 p. m., July 7, 1983]
citation: Ronald Reagan, Executive Order 12430-Reports of Identical Bids Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/263277
